Release notes¶

Version 0.3.2¶

0.3.2 2021-03-29¶

Feature

  • Add interactive plotting functions: gene_plot_interactive(), cluster_plot_interactive(), het_plot_interactive()

  • Add basic unittest (will add more in the future).

  • Add 'contour' parameter to use contour plot in gene_plot() and het_plot().

  • Add convert_scanpy() to convert object from scanpy to stLearn.

Bug fixes

  • Refactor gene_plot()

  • Refactor cluster_plot()

  • Refactor het_plot()

  • Fixed issue with networkx object cannot write h5ad file.
